snippet.title: Demeo | Mac and iPad Launch
snippet.description:
Demeo is now available for play on Mac and iPad today. A cooperative fantasy adventure game, Demeo takes the best parts of tabletop strategy experiences and optimizes them for quick decisions and tactical group discussions.

Play today: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/demeo/id6463004635

https://resolutiongames.com/demeo
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DemeoGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/demeo
#Demeo #ResolutionGames #ipad #mac #RPG #appstore
